resources: Instant Connect IceFlutterWifiLock IceFlutterMulticastLock IceFlutterWakeLock 727b050a-9b5a-4a34-9040-5d0483419dce ICE Flutter Service Notifications ICE Flutter Private Call Notification Dynamic Frontline Communications Instant Connect Communications service is ready PTT button needs to be manually assigned // MDM app config ICE Server Address Hostname or IP address of ICE Server. Leave blank if not managed. Show Server Address at Login If enabled, the ICE server address field is visible during login. Otherwise it is hidden when known. Verbose Logging Logs collected by the application will contain additional information for troubleshooting if needed. Launch App on Device Start If enabled, the ICE app will automatically start after the device boots up. Tactical Mode Enable tactical-mode features in the app. Tactical mode allows ICE Mobile and ICE Desktop users to communicate without an ICE Server. Radio Mode Only one active channel at a time. Telephony as a Channel Treat phone calls like PTT channels. Require that a push-to-talk button is pressed to un-mute your microphone while on a phone call. On-screen PTT Button When disabled, only a device button, wired or Bluetooth PTT accessory can be used to transmit on selected channels. Share Location Device location is shared with the ICE server if permission is granted by the user. Instant Replay Received and transmitted audio on channels are recorded locally for playback. Emergency Alert Button If the device/accessory is equipped with a secondary button, a short-press will answer or hangup a call and a long-press will decline a call. Telephony Call Button If the device/accessory is equipped with a secondary button, answer or hangup a call with a short-press and decline a call with a long-press. Allow channel muting Allows a channel to be muted by tapping on the speaker icon on the channel card. Lock Configurations for User If enabled, these configurations cannot be modifiable in the ICE app. Stereo Audio If enabled, the speaker mode is set to stereo allowing a channel to choose speaker.
